item.title: Tom Ascol: God’s Law for Salvation and Creation [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ March 07, 2024
What does Genesis 1:1 have to do with John 3:16? On this week's show, Mike is joined by the Senior Pastor of Grace Baptist Church and President of Founders Ministries, Tom Ascol, to talk about the necessity of grounding a Christian doctrine of salvation upon a Christian understanding of creation. 

Episode Resource: Grace Baptist Church | Cape Coral, FL: https://truegraceofgod.org/; Founders Ministries: https://founders.org/; "What Does Genesis 11 Have to Do with John 3:16?" | Founders Ministries | https://founders.org/articles/what-does-genesis-11-have-to-do-with-john-316/.

item.title: Ep. 78: Analyzing the Rise of Hostility Against Churches [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
Family Research Council's recently released report "Hostility Against Churches Is on the Rise in the United States: Analyzing Incidents from 2018-2023", they identified 915 acts of hostility against churches in the United States between 2018-2023. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by the author of the report FRC's Arielle Del Turco and The Washington Stand's Ben Johnson to discuss the influences that have led to the increasingly violent acts being committed against these sacred places of worship. As these attacks become more frequent, Arielle and Ben unpack the motivations, the public's perception of these crimes, and how the courts have responded. It has been said that culture can impact politics, but what we are seeing here, is that politics can also impact culture.

Resources

  • ⁠Hostility Against Churches Is on the Rise in the United States: Analyzing Incidents from 2018-2023⁠ by Arielle Del Turco

item.title: SCOTUS’s Trump Ballot Decisions Exposes a Faithless Christianity [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: With its 9 to zero decision on Monday reversing Colorado’s removal of Donald Trump from the ballot, the United States Supreme Court schooled some Christian legal and policy organizations on how the Fourteenth Amendment works. And in doing so it exposed the “Hagar method” of legal advocacy they are employing to “protect” parental rights. Don’t be seduced by the promise this method holds out  because God seems slack in His promises.

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 03/07/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ March 07, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

[Segment 1] - COVID Fallout Continues...AGAIN:
"9 Ont. nurses fired for refusing COVID vaccines should be reinstated, arbitrator rules" | CTV News | https://www.ctvnews.ca/health/9-ont-nurses-fired-for-refusing-covid-vaccines-should-be-reinstated-arbitrator-rules-1.6795363;
"Unvaccinated marginalized 'far-right'" | True North | https://tnc.news/2024/02/28/unvaccinated-marginalized-far-right;
"Exclusive: Health Canada official says politicians pressured him on COVID vaccine approvals" | Lioness of Judah | https://lionessofjudah.substack.com/p/exclusive-health-canada-official;
"COVID-19 may have been created by scientists in Wuhan lab: Professor" | Toronto Sun | https://torontosun.com/news/world/covid-19-may-have-been-created-by-scientists-in-wuhan-lab-professor;
"CDC announces new COVID-19 recommendations for isolation, masks, and tests" | CBS News | https://www.cbsnews.com/news/cdc-covid-recommendations-isolation-masks-tests;

[Segment 2] - A Woke Win at X (formerly a free-speech platform, formerly Twitter):
"Twitter reinstates its policy against misgendering and deadnaming users" | PCMag | https://www.pcmag.com/news/twitter-reinstates-its-policy-against-misgendering-and-deadnaming-users;
"Woman thrown out of Ontario city council meeting for raising concerns on universal gender-neutral common area" | The Post Millennial | https://thepostmillennial.com/woman-thrown-out-of-ontario-city-council-meeting-for-raising-concerns-on-universal-gender-neutral-common-area;
"Alberta town bans pride crosswalks, flags" | True North | https://tnc.news/2024/02/23/alberta-town-bans-pride-crosswalks-flags;

[Segment 3] -Canada Continues to Spend Money it Doesn't Have on Things it Doesn't Need:
"Trudeau sending another $3 billion to Ukraine, including $4 million for gender and diversity" | The Post Millennial | https://thepostmillennial.com/trudeau-sending-another-3-billion-to-ukraine-including-4-million-for-gender-and-diversity;
"Canada announces additional support for Ukraine" | Office of the Prime Minister | [https://www.pm.gc.ca/en/news/backgrounders/2024/02/24/canada-announces-additional-support-ukraine.

item.title: 146: If I were Prime Minister [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron encourages the listeners to take part in a mental exercise by thinking about what you would do if you were elected as your nation's leader! What policies would you enact? What would change? How would you bring your nation back to order and back to God? All of that and more in this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock!

item.title: Why Calvinism: Dr. Sam Frost, Austin Keeler, & Dr. Michael Schultz [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
Continuing our three part series from the "Why Calvinism" Conference, this week Greg sat down with Dr. Sam Frost, Austin Keeler, and Dr. Michael Schultz. Greg discussed Full VS Partial Preterism with Dr. Sam Frost. He discussed the Holy Nope brand with Austin, as well as his time as a missionary in Africa. Greg wrapped up the episode with Dr. Schultz discussing Calvinism and the love of God, if God loves everyone, as well as his wife's books pertaining to the loss of a child and her young adult series. Enjoy!

Follow Austin Keeler and his Holy Nope videos here

Find out more about Dr. Michael Schultz here

item.author: George Grant
item.itunes:author: George Grant

item.title: Ep. 77: Janet Boynes – A Story of Redemption [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: For 14 years, Janet Boynes lived as a lesbian. She joins host Joseph Backholm to tell her story of how she went from living as a lesbian to a life passionately devoted to Jesus and helping others who struggle with same sex attraction. She walks through the events of her early childhood and how they affected her actions and decisions, how the church should respond to the effects of the sexual revolution, and offers encouragement to anyone struggling as she did. Sin will take you further than you want to go and keep you longer than you want to stay. Janet’s testimony is one that illuminates the transformative power of the gospel and offers encouragement to anyone who currently feels stuck in a cycle of sin.

item.title: TCND: Leaders Take Initiative (Backpack of Conversation) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
Hi, Neighbor!  John and Luke called an "audible" at church last week and switched up the communion prep system.  Who's going to be mad about that?  (Well, some people might.) 

If you start taking responsibility and making decisions then you will deal with some pushback. But, overall, you will be a HUGE ASSET to a healthy church (or soccer program).  Leaders take initiative!

Later:  Luke shares his fail-proof system for aspiring conversationalists. If you're wondering, "How does Luke always have something interesting to say???" be prepared to take notes!

Email the Comedian's family at nextdoor@johnbranyan.com

item.title: Begging the Question of Christ and Culture [The Pugcast]
item.description:
Richard Niebuhr's classic, Christ and Culture has shaped the way we understand the relationship of the church and culture by assuming that what we mean by "Christ" when we discuss Christ and culture is Christian ethics. But is that the right place to start? Shouldn't ontology be the starting place since all things were created by Christ and for him? (Col. 1:15-17) If we take this as our starting point, what becomes of Niebuhr's famous archetypes of Christ and Culture? Join the Pugs today as they ruminate on the theme!

 

Support the Pugcast in Oxford on Indiegogo: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-pugcast-goes-to-oxford/x/6893861#/

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: Exposing the Christian Divide over a Civilization-Defining SCOTUS Decision [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: When the United States Supreme Court held in 2015 that the Fourteenth Amendment prohibited states from issuing marriage licenses to only male and female applicants, it didn’t expand the definition of marriage, but abolished it. Today David explains why this was a civilization defining decision, how gay rights lawyers are using it to redefine the parent-child relationship, and how certain Christian legal and policy organizations seem not to understand what happened to our nation.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Ep. 76: Alabama, IVF, and the Dignity of Human Life [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
Recently, the Alabama Supreme Court took a case regarding the accidental death of frozen embryos in an IVF (in vitro fertilization) clinic. The question leading the trial was: Can parents sue for wrongful death because the embryos were accidentally destroyed, and it was an accident inside the laboratory? Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Family Research Council's Mary Szoch, for a discussion about IVF and the sanctity of human life. She weighs in on the process of IVF, the ethical arguments surrounding it, and the impact this court case will have on the future of IVF.

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. Published by ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Family Research Council⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠.

item.title: THE END IS NIGH FOR FREE SPEECH IN CANADA [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ February 29, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew dive deep into two pieces of legislation that would practically end free speech in Canada, Bills C-367 and C-63.

[Segment 1] - Bill C-367:
Criminal Code (R.S.C., 1985, c. C-46) | Government of Canada:  laws-lois.justice.gc.ca/eng/acts/c-46;
Bill C-367 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code (forced organ harvesting)) | Parliament of Canada: parl.ca/documentviewer/en/44-1/bill/C-367/first-reading;

[Segment 2] - Bill C-63:
Government of Canada Introduces Legislation to Combat Harmful Content Online, Including the Sexual Exploitation of Children | Government of Canada: canada.ca/en/canadian-heritage/news/2024/02/government-of-canada-introduces-legislation-to-combat-harmful-content-online-including-the-sexual-exploitation-of-children.html;
Bill C-63 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code and the Youth Criminal Justice Act (cyberbullying)) | Parliament of Canada: parl.ca/DocumentViewer/en/44-1/bill/C-63/first-reading;

[Segment 3] - The Response:
"Online harms bill could stifle free speech, critics warn" | True North: tnc.news/2024/02/21/online-harms-free-speech;
"Carson Jerema: Don't believe the Liberals. Online harms act targets free speech" | National Post: nationalpost.com/opinion/carson-jerema-dont-believe-the-liberals-online-harms-act-targets-free-speech.

item.description:
In this bonus episode, Greg sat down with Dr. Leighton Flowers. Leighton is a Pastor, Professor, and Apologist. He is the creator of Soteriology101. In this episode, Leighton explains the reasons why he left Calvinism after 10 years, and what bible verses led him to that decision. It was an interesting episode. Enjoy!

item.title: Why Calvinism: Jeremiah Nortier, Andrew Rappaport, & James White [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description:
Greg traveled down to Tullahoma, Tennessee for the "Why Calvinism" Conference. He interviewed many of the speakers. On this episode you'll hear from Jeremiah Nortier and the dangers of full preterism, Andrew Rappaport and why the government is attacking christianity, and Dr. James White and some of the tactics he uses for debates, how he chooses opponents, and a history of his debate resume. Enjoy!

Jeremiah Nortier pastors at 12Five Church and his apologetic youtube channel, "The Apologetic Dog" can be found HERE

Andrew Rappaport is an author, podcaster, and President of Striving For Eternity

Dr. James White is an author, podcaster, teaching elder, and President of Alpha & Omega Ministries.

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 02/27/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ February 27, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

[Segment 1] - COVID Fallout Continues:
"One-Third of Doctors, Half of Nurses in Canada Reluctant to Take COVID Vaccines: Government Survey" | The Epoch Times: theepochtimes.com/world/one-third-of-doctors-half-of-nurses-in-canada-reluctant-to-take-covid-vaccines-government-survey-5590179;
"6 Major Adverse Reactions Found Among 99 Million Vaccine Recipients: New Study | Facts Matter" | The Epoch Times: theepochtimes.com/epochtv/6-major-adverse-reactions-found-among-99-million-vaccine-recipients-new-study-facts-matter-5591300;
"ICS4: Regulatory Agencies Cannot Prove COVID Vaccines Do Not Cause DNA Integration: Dr. Robert Malone" | Bright Light News: brightlightnews.com/ics4-regulatory-agencies-cannot-prove-covid-vaccines-do-not-cause-dna-integration-dr-robert-malone;
"Australian Court Rules Employers Who Mandated Jab Legally Liable for Injuries" | Western Standard: westernstandard.news/news/australian-court-rules-employers-who-mandated-jab-legally-liable-for-injuries/52430;

[Segment 2] - Canada is a Woke Hot Mess:
"TDSB Calls Education a Colonial Structure Centered on Whiteness" | Toronto Sun: torontosun.com/opinion/columnists/tdsb-calls-education-a-colonial-structure-centred-on-whiteness;
"Canadian High Schoolers Given Pornographic Book, Wooden Penises, Condoms for Sex Ed" | The Post Millennial: thepostmillennial.com/canadian-high-schoolers-given-pornographic-book-wooden-penises-condoms-for-sex-ed?utm_content=;
"Liberals Affordability Retreats" | True North: tnc.news/2024/02/22/liberals-affordability-retreats;

[Segment 3] -Canada's Crazy Climate Cult:
"Environment Canada to Invest in Bill Gates-Inspired Sun-Blocking Technology" | The Counter Signal: thecountersignal.com/environment-canada-to-invest-in-bill-gates-inspired-sun-blocking-technology;

item.title: Ep. 75: Josh Abbotoy on Creating Intentional Christian Communities and Institutions [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
There is some truth behind the saying “You are the product of your environment.” Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Josh Abbotoy for a conversation exploring Christians' need to establish communities and institutions amidst the cultural shifts of society. Emphasizing the importance of Christians engaging in civic leadership and building legacies, Josh explains his vision of creating an intentional community centered around principles that promote family, freedom, and faith. He stresses that these communities are not just for Christians, but for all who desire to live in an environment that aligns with all their personal values.

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. Published by ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Family Research Council⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠.

item.title: The Diseased Defects and Effects of Popular Culture [The Pugcast]
item.description:
Culture, especially its charged symbolism. After unpacking insights from church fathers like Tertullian and Augustine, in their Christian critiques of Public Spectacle Events, the gang enters into important discussion about the impact, function, and role of current Celebrity, Popular Culture, and Spectacles like the Super Bowl, and ponder Christian ways of reading, relating to, going to war with the spiritual character in which these are cloaked.

 

Article about ‘Adult AI’ mentioned by CR: https://www.digitalliturgies.net/p/christians-are-not-ready-for-the

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/
